title: Dry ranch dressing mix
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons dried milk powder', '2 tablespoons dried onion', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '1 tablespoon dried chives', '1/4 teaspoon salt or to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon celery seeds', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon dried dill']
